name: Dungeon of the Dead
description:
Dungeon of the Dead is an FPS game in which players must defend a dungeon from zombie hordes. This project was created solely by me, Shane Carroll, using some OpenSource and Royalty-Free Assets, a list of which will be linked below.

Have a play of the game and let me know what you think!

Background Music: http://soundimage.org/wp-content/uploads/2016/03/Theyre-Closing-In_Looping.mp3

Gun Firing Sound: http://soundbible.com/1998-Gun-Fire.html

GUI Assets: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/gui/necromancer-gui-366

Weapon Assets: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/weapons/fps-weapon-pack-hd-2017-1...

First-Person Controller: Unity Standard Character Assets.

Dungeon Prefabs/Environment: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/dungeons/decrepit-dungeon-...

Zombie Prefab & Animations:  https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/characters/humanoids/zombie-30232

Wood Textures: https://opengameart.org/content/two-wooden-textures

Concrete Textures: https://opengameart.org/node/38213

Any other questions just ask!
